name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Short links to products in Amazon

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Links to products contain different data that are not needed by the seller, the application removes unnecessary data from the linksâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Links to products contain different data that are not needed by the seller, the application removes unnecessary data from the links and terminates direct links to products.

There is a function in which you choose which links you need for the product.

There is a function that opens the product in a new tab.

There is a function that generates all unnecessary data from the links to the store.

A simple application to cut unnecessary data in links, as well as links for links to Amazon products.

Applications created for merchants who are looking for products to sell on Amazon

Applications only work on Amazon.com
